text: The 2020 Barangay Ginebra San Miguel season is the 41st season of the franchise in the Philippine Basketball Association (PBA). ==Key dates== *December 8: The 2019 PBA draft took place in Midtown Atrium, Robinson Place Manila. *March 11: The PBA postponed the season due to the threat of the coronavirus. ==Draft picks== {| class="wikitable sortable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- ! style="" width:10%;"|Round ! style="" width:10%;"|Pick ! style="" width:20%;"|Player ! style="" width:15%;"|Position ! style="" width:15%;"|Nationality ! style="" width:20%;"|College / Team |- | 1 || 10 || Arvin Tolentino || PF || || Far Eastern |- | 2 || 13 || Jerrick Balanza || SG || || Letran |- | 2 || 22 || Kent Salado || SG || || Arellano |- | 3 || 33 || Fran Asuncion || PG || || AMA |} ==Roster== ==Philippine Cup== ===Eliminations=== ====Standings==== ====Game log==== |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | October 11 | NLEX | W 102–92 | Aljon Mariano (20) | Scottie Thompson (11) | Pringle, Thompson (5) | AUF Sports Arena & Cultural Center | 1–0 |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | October 15 | Blackwater | W 103–99 | Prince Caperal (24) | Aljon Mariano (11) | Scottie Thompson (7) | AUF Sports Arena & Cultural Center | 2–0 ==Transactions== ===Free agents=== ====Rookie signings==== {| class="wikitable sortable sortable" ! style="" width="10%"| Player ! style="" width="10%"| Signed ! style="" width="10%"| PBA D-League team |- style="text- align: center" | Jerrick Balanza | Undisclosed | Petron |- style="text-align: center" | Arvin Tolentino | Undisclosed | Wang's Basketball Couriers |} ==References== Category:Barangay Ginebra San Miguel seasons Barangay Ginebra San Miguel
title: 2020 Barangay Ginebra San Miguel season
